decision_conditions: The applicant is advised that they need to address the comments raised by the Canal & River Trust in regards to clarifying the drainage design, as part of an application to discharge condition 9 (drainage) of planning permission ref: 13226/APP/2018/2112, dated 11-03-19.

Notwithstanding the approved details, further information in regards to the construction phase of the development is required to fully discharge condition 15 (Construction and Demolition Management Plan) of planning permission ref: 13226/APP/2018/2112, dated 11-03-19.

The information required includes phasing of the construction works; hours of work; noise and vibration; air quality; waste management; site remediation; plant and equipment; site transportation and traffic management including routing, signage, permitted hours for construction traffic and construction materials deliveries.

Notwithstanding the approved details, further details in regards to any excavations and earthworks to be carried out during the construction phase of the development is required to fully discharge condition 19 (excavations/earthworks) of planning permission ref: 13226/APP/2018/2112, dated 11-03-19.
description: Details pursuant to partial discharge of Conditions 15 (Construction and Demolition Management Plan) and 19 (excavations/earthworks), in relation to the demolition phase only, of planning permission ref: 13226/APP/2018/2112, dated 11-03-19 (Demolition of existing unit and redevelopment of the site to provide two modern employment units consisting of 16,918 sq m (GIA) for flexible employment purposes within Use Classes B1c/B2/B8 with ancillary offices, car parking, landscaping, service yard areas and ancillary uses as well as associated external works)
